title: Conversation with Sam Altman at WEF 2024: ‘Like computers didn’t kill chess, AI won’t...' | WEF 2024
description:
OpenAI’s CEO Sam Altman said Artificial Intelligence (AI) won’t replace human care. Speaking at the World Economic Forum, Altman said people are finding ways to use AI for great productivity gains even with AI’s limited current capability and very deep flaws. Just like computer didn’t kill the game of chess, Artificial Intelligence (AI) won’t replace human care for each other, Sam Altman added.
